name: quiz-royale
description: ## üèÜ Overview Quiz Royale is a fun and competitive multiplayer quiz game where players compete against each other in real-time trivia battles. Test your knowledge, challenge others, and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of the ultimate quiz champion. Featuring a variety of question categories, real-time multiplayer matches, and an engaging UI, Quiz Royale is designed for quiz lovers who want to experience competitive learning!
author: Omkar Sonawane
